name: RoboGarden
description:
Hey Everyone!
This is my first time uploading a game I made online.
I made a "Plants vs Zombies" ripoff called RoboGarden. It is basically a tower defense game made in pixel art!

I had a really rough time balancing the game (Spawn time, enemy speed and health, player units health and dmg).
It would mean the world to me if you comment what you think and maybe all the improvements to the balance!
thanks for trying this out, Eden.
